entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
